external_references.description: QiAnXin Threat Intelligence Center. (2019, February 18). APT-C-36: Continuous Attacks Targeting Colombian Government Institutions and Corporations. Retrieved May 5, 2020.

description: [APT-C-36](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0099) obtained and used a modified variant of [Imminent Monitor](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0434).(Citation: QiAnXin APT-C-36 Feb2019)
